alert.note: Alert for Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Brevard County through 815 PM EDT... At 730 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Palm Bay, moving northeast at 25 mph. Additional strong storms are pushing offshore Brevard County. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Rockledge, Cocoa Beach and Satellite Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
